	//A tömbök elemszáma: 83
    int ora[]={9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,9,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,11,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,12,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13,13};
    int perc[]={3,8,9,10,12,16,18,22,22,28,31,38,40,42,44,44,48,52,58,2,6,8,14,18,21,22,26,29,32,33,33,39,43,49,56,1,3,9,16,20,21,24,30,30,32,34,38,40,44,49,50,54,59,1,4,10,13,18,22,28,32,34,40,43,49,52,53,56,3,9,9,13,19,23,27,33,36,42,48,52,54,54,59};
    int masodperc[]={14,19,29,58,0,17,34,12,39,50,40,20,6,37,11,42,9,21,4,34,11,57,45,49,47,24,40,35,45,19,33,16,31,10,2,2,54,41,29,0,52,27,16,52,40,18,56,13,39,30,22,48,58,24,10,4,50,20,41,2,47,12,43,17,20,28,22,40,39,25,27,5,2,32,32,7,9,41,52,12,21,37,48};
    int csapat[]={3,12,7,10,19,3,8,13,18,1,5,12,4,2,11,7,3,10,16,22,19,13,8,24,21,12,18,20,3,7,1,10,5,2,15,4,13,12,22,11,16,8,24,21,3,18,7,14,5,1,19,10,12,13,20,2,3,4,15,16,7,21,8,11,22,13,3,12,1,10,24,18,5,19,2,20,16,7,11,4,8,13,12};
    int indul[]={10,5,10,19,20,17,8,7,6,29,12,9,35,11,13,19,50,17,16,22,8,11,12,10,8,23,14,11,43,25,10,25,16,38,32,13,14,27,11,17,22,28,8,22,49,18,13,17,18,20,26,30,33,19,32,40,55,17,17,29,16,38,39,21,14,12,17,22,28,39,20,13,27,13,19,37,35,28,28,20,17,27,5};
